name: CNBCMarketsNow
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
CNBC Markets Now provides a look at the days market moves with commentary and analysis from Michael Santoli, CNBC Senior Markets Commentator.
Add CNBC Markets Now to your Flash Briefing and move it to the top of your news by going to Settings in the Alexa app. You can manage your Flash Briefing under Account.
After adding CNBC Markets Now, you can say “Alexa, what’s my Flash Briefing?” or “Alexa, what’s in the news?” to hear the latest.
Don't forget to check out all of CNBC's Flash Briefings on Alexa, including Mad Money Cramer Remix, CNBC Tech Check, and more. Just search for "CNBC" in the Alexa Skill Store.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
